subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, despite inconsistent play, beat the Jazz on Monday and are in contention for the final postseason spot in the Eastern Conference in part because the Atlanta Hawks have lost 20 of 27 games.
snippet: The Knicks, despite inconsistent play, beat the Jazz on Monday and are in contention for the final postseason spot in the Eastern Conference in part because the Atlanta Hawks have lost 20 of 27 games.
